title: Clinical Specialties
description: Our practitioners are trained in both conventional and complementary therapies. We assess your individual needs and listen to your concerns and goals for well-being in order to offer a professionally guided, whole-person approach to your health care.
sitename: UCSF Osher Center for Integrative Health
cleaned_text: Clinical Specialties Our practitioners are trained in both conventional and complementary therapies. We assess your individual needs and listen to your concerns and goals for well-being in order to offer a professionally guided, whole-person approach to your health care. Our New Patient Navigator can help you to determine which treatment, service or program is best for you. Please call (415) 353-7716 to speak with our New Patient Navigator.
